title: Program for Mitigating EFL Learning Anxiety and Enhancing Engagement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English Communication Skills and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Requires customized design considering psychological burdens of middle-aged/older learners, accounting for potential disparities in digital device proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more anxiety-reduction strategies by recognizing and utilizing Teacher Support Behaviors (TCB).
Learners achieve an 80%+ session participation rate by applying activity design techniques that enhance learning engagement (LE).
Learners report over 70% self-efficacy in simulated presentation projects using English Learning Strategies (ELS).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
